{"id":1372734757,"question_id":72,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1724977251,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1372734757/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"13.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        word1 = '0' + word1;\n        word2 = '0' + word2;\n        int N = (int)word1.size();\n        int M = (int)word2.size();\n\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(N, vector<int>(M, INT_MAX));\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) \n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        for (int j=0; j<M; j++)\n            dp[0][j] = j;\n\n        for (int i=1; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=1; j<M; j++) {\n                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j-1] + (word1[i] != word2[j]));\n                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i][j-1] + 1);\n                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j] + 1);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[N-1][M-1];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
